Far North’s strong Croatian roots strengthened with rugby tour from Dalmation descendants https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-strong-croatian-roots-strengthened-with-rugby-tour-from-dalmation-descendants/7ZC65RMOGBA7RCBQGXDTU4HJAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-norths-strong-croatian-roots-strengthened-with-rugby-tour-from-dalmation-descendants/7ZC65RMOGBA7RCBQGXDTU4HJAQ/ Mike DinsdaleFar North Croatian descendants flying out for rugby tour of forefathers' homeland. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Dave Jurlina, from Taipa’s Eastern United Rugby Club, has organised the Northland Tarara Croatian rugby team to travel to Croatia in October for a four-match tour. Most of the players have Croatian/Dalmation ancestry.

Mon, 02 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Quarry Rd Bridge, off SH1, leading to Kaitāia Airport, will have an upgrade to remove a flooding ‘pinch point’ that threatens Kaitāia and Awanui.
